name: Little Mermaid Fashion Show!
description:
If your little girl is a fashionista who loves mermaids and princesses, this is the dress up app for you! You can create your own beautiful mermaid princess with Mermaid Fashion Show- a virtual paper doll app that lets you make and dress up a pretty mermaid fit for a fairy tale! Select her skin tone, eye color, hair color, hair style and outfit to make this cute paper doll look just like you!

Have fun dressing up your mermaid from a wardrobe full of pretty dresses, jeweled tiaras, try on a glitter gem necklace, bracelet, earring, ring (the jewelry sparkles!) and purse to create the latest in mermaid style. Pick out your mermaid's tail, hairstyle, and customize her features. You can give her a name, and she can even have an underwater pet- like a sweet little mermaid kitten or a cute sea turtle! She can model her fairytale outfit in lots of different scenes like an underwater ruin, a rainbow coral reef, a sunny island, and more fun underwater places!

Roll the dice to get a new mermaid with a different, random outfit every time.

When you're done giving her a beauty makeover, you can save your mermaid princess to your device's photo album. Show off your fashionista skills by creating endless outfits for your mermaid dress up doll!

Features:
-Game is for girls ages three and older.
-Includes over 20 dresses with tons of accessories, 12 mermaid pets and 8 different backgrounds.
-Beautiful graphics by children’s book artist Laura Tallardy.
-Available in 8 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Korean, Japanese and Chinese
-Child-friendly!

Note for Parents
This app:
- Contains a limited amount of free content with an in-app purchase to unlock everything in a "Parents Page".
- Does not contain third party advertisements.
- Does not contain links to social networks.
- Does not use data collection tools.
- Does not require an internet connection to play.
Please see our privacy policy for more information.
